cmp: 干 (dry/to concern/shield, to work/to do/to manage, manage/stem)
mng: flat, level, equal, to tie (make the same score), to draw (score), calm, peaceful, see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

exm.mng: average, on average, evenly, in equal proportions
ordinarily, in normal times, in peacetime
Deng Xiaoping (1904-1997), Chinese communist leader, de facto leader of PRC 1978-1990 and creator of "socialism with Chinese characteristics"
life (a person's whole life), in one's entire life
